title: Professional Competency Strengthening Project Through Personal Learning Environment Construction

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced specialized knowledge in scientific fields and practical experience
context.additional_context: A process where learners design and execute self-directed personal learning environments using digital devices, deepening professional competencies through collaborative problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can identify and utilize at least three digital tools and strategies that constitute a Personal Learning Environment (PLE)
Learners can evaluate their ability to establish and implement self-directed learning plans during project execution
Learners can share learning resources and strengthen collaborative competencies through interactions with peer learners
Learners can analyze decision-making cases using PLE in scientific problem-solving processes and submit written reports
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
